response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and add substantial value to your company. This product, while priced at $800,000, offers unparalleled features and benefits that I am confident will exceed your expectations.

Considering its immense potential to impact your business positively, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exceptional return on investment and aligns closely with your strategic objectives.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product's capabilities and how it can be integrated into your existing systems. I am here to support you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 750000}
